PICANTO 1.0 MT RUNNER PE
Stunning Picanto Runner in excellent condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, power steering and controls on steering wheel. Radio with bluetooth and USB port. This panel van is a manual transmission and gives a comfortable drive for long and near distances. Great fuel consumption. Perfect for transporting all goods. Visit your Konfidence dealership in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book it for a test drive. Nationwide delivery.
